main_definition: In the context of idioms, 'peas' refers to small green seeds or legumes often used in cooking.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Seeds that are eaten as a vegetable
meanings_and_examples.example: Groundhog Day is almost here, and I can't wait to eat peas for dinner.
Don't worry about the tiny mistakes in your report; they're just a few peas on an ocean of work.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group or collection of similar entities, used metaphorically to suggest modesty
meanings_and_examples.example: She didn't want to boast about her achievements, so she said they were just a handful of peas in the grand scheme of things.
